Posts.Title: LinS returns..bilateral dble mastectomy 4-18-07 LinS LUVmy2girlZ

Posts.Content: LinS wrote: hi sisters.... meant to write surgery was 3-18-08..sorry!!!! im all messed up and depressed..was in hospital for 5 days....   been home for what ..2 wks?? my brain is all messed up from fatigue and surgery and meds... need major support right now..2morrow i have to have a day surgery to have some fluid drained that came back after the bulbs were removed..its soo hot and swollen and hurts. i start chemo tuesday...first blood wrk in am then port put in then right to first chemo treatment. my dr.s r all still excellet and personally call me and im fortunate there....husbands sorta in denial and avoiding everything..wont read any of literature or anything....and i feel i havent a support i need. will lose my hair in the first month and thats ok cuz i was mentally prepared and got a sexy wig to boost my spirit. have been dpressed the last few days tho..alone alot..lots of leg swelling and nown this fluid appearing again 2day....have cried alot and feel depression. i need lots of support if any of you can help lift me up..please text my cell..thats how desperate and alone i feel inside......607-379-3836......i am barely on computer and know i will have trouble sleeping 2nite especially.. as 4 my surgery..they removed both breasts as both ended up showing cancer lumps..more than 3 each...and was in stage 3 quickly.  however my lymphnodes were clear..thank God! Please send me encouraginging texts...im getting real low and need all of you and any advice,prayers,kindness..etc... thank  you......Linda Stafford  607*379-3836 Dx 2/25/2008, IDC, 2cm, mets Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: LinS returns..bilateral dble mastectomy 4-18-07 LinS LUVmy2girlZ

Posts.Content: Apr 1, 2008 09:15PM LinS wrote: I highly recommend everyone going thru this look at this site/photos..Thumbs up crazydaisy....thank you sooooo muc. My story is almost 100 percent the same and I too had pictures done..amateur..but nonethless..i wanted them taken or my own piece of mind and as well as i believe it is a type of very personal art form of our very human bodies...that many take for granted that dont "get" what cancer does...mentally, physically and so on. Excellent Excellent...this helped me 2nite alot as I am going thru  a  rough patch. These photos are what reality and hope is for all of us sisters. Thank you so very much. Hugs! Bless You---- Linda S
